Name: Africa
Description: Second largest continent, rich in culture and biodiversity.

Name: Asia
Description: Largest continent, home to many ancient civilizations.

Name: Europe
Description: Diverse continent with a rich history and economic influence.

Name: North America
Description: Includes Canada, USA, and Mexico, known for its diversity.

Name: South America
Description: Known for the Amazon rainforest and diverse cultures.

Name: Australia
Description: Smallest continent, home to unique wildlife and landscapes.

Name: Antarctica
Description: Icy continent with no permanent residents, focused on research.
